name: JAYU PET Dental Spray for Dogs & Cats, Dog Breath Freshener & Tartar Control, No Brushing Needed, Protects Teeth & Gums, Easy Daily Oral Care, 1 fl oz
short_description: Tartar & Plaque Control: Effectively reduces tartar and plaque buildup on teeth and gums when used daily; supports cleaner, healthier teeth and a brighter smile for your pet.

Fresh breath & healthier gums, without brushing: Gently eliminates odor-causing buildup while helping reduce plaque and irritation. Keeps your pet’s mouth clean, fresh, and healthy every day. Strengthens teeth and gums naturally for long-lasting freshness, no toothbrush or rinsing required.

Easy to use, spray or add to water: Simply spray directly into your pet’s mouth or add one pump to 500ml of water. Tasteless, odorless, and stress-free, even for picky pets. Makes daily oral care simple and effortless.

Long-lasting protection, up to 7 days: Creates an invisible shield that helps prevent plaque buildup and tooth decay. Keeps enamel strong and breath fresh for days, supporting lasting oral health with minimal effort.

Safe, natural & gentle formula: Made from food-grade ingredients and free from alcohol or harsh chemicals. 100% safe for daily use on dogs and cats of all breeds, ages, and sizes — gentle yet highly effective.

name: Furaqua Pet Dental Spray for Dogs & Cats – Enzyme-Based Oral Care Mist with Hypochlorous Acid & Galla Japonica to Freshen Breath, Support Clean Teeth and Promote Healthy Gums (1)
short_description: 【Enzyme-Powered Fresh Breath Support】This enzyme-based pet dental spray combines natural enzymes, hypochlorous acid and galla japonica to help reduce sources of bad breath while supporting a cleaner mouth. Designed for dogs and cats needing an easy daily oral care routine.

【Helps Maintain Clean Teeth & Tartar Care】Regular use supports cleaner teeth by helping reduce plaque buildup and promoting gentle tartar care. Suitable for adult pets, seniors and puppies or kittens over 12 weeks, making daily oral hygiene simpler for multi-pet households.

【Gum-Friendly Oral Care Formula】Crafted to support healthy gums and a balanced oral environment, this gentle formula helps keep your pet’s mouth feeling fresh. Ideal for maintaining everyday cleanliness and encouraging a more pleasant close-contact experience.

【Easy No-Rinse Spray for Daily Use】The simple mist format makes oral care stress-free—just spray 2–3 times per side once or twice daily with no brushing required. Perfect for pets who dislike traditional brushing and helps reach areas brushes often miss.

【Natural, Gentle & Vet-Friendly Blend】Made with a natural, vegan-friendly and cruelty-free formula free from harsh ingredients. Gentle enough for everyday use and designed to complement your pet’s regular wellness routine without disrupting eating or playtime.

product_description: Leba III pet dental spray Leba III dental spray is designed to balance the chemistry of the mouth for dogs and cats. A buildup of plaque and tartar leads to dental problems like gum disease, infection and discomfort. It does not contain any antibiotics, as this eliminates the beneficial bacteria as well. Leba III works by stimulating enzymes that eat away at tartar and soften it, allowing it to fall off. It is All-Natural and has No side effects. No brushing, no change in diet. . . People nad pets love it herbal product, causes no enamel damage and no side effects. 100 response in double blind tests. Save your pet the Trauma of anesthesia save yourself the expense of periodontal cleanings. Ideal for home dental care

name: Arm & Hammer for Pets Tartar Control Dental Spray for Dogs | Dog Dental Spray Reduces Plaque & Tartar Buildup Without Brushing | Mint Flavor, 4 Ounces (Pack of 2)
short_description: FRESHENS BREATH FOR DOGS — Dental spray for dogs eliminates bad breath and keeps your dog's teeth in top form, making your pet all the more lovable
MADE WITH NATURAL INGREDIENTS — Formulated with natural ingredients that work as a dog breath freshener, this dog dental spray leaves behind a pleasant mint scent to fight bad dog breath

SPRAY DIRECTLY ONTO TEETH AND GUMS — To use this dental spray for dogs, lift lips on either side of dog's mouth. Spray 1 to 2 pumps directly onto teeth and gums per side. For best results, do not let dog drink or eat for one hour after use
FIGHTS TARTAR — This dog spray effectively fights tartar to give your dog a healthier mouth, whiten his teeth, and improve his oral hygiene
ENJOY YOUR DOG'S KISSES — Enjoy your dog's kisses, without the stinky dog breath!
product_description: The Arm & Hammer name has been trusted for over 100 years for gentle yet effective cleaning. Arm & Hammer Oral Care for Pets brings those same cleaning methods to our companion animals, making it easy for pet parents to provide dental health solutions that work. Our dental spray whitens teeth, fights tartar buildup and eliminates bad dog breath, keeping your dog's teeth in top form. Baking soda cleans and deodorizes while enzymes fight tartar. Made in China.Directions: Lift lips on either side of dog's mouth. Spray 1 to 2 pumps directly onto teeth and gums per side. For best results, do not let dog drink or eat for one hour after use.Ingredients: Water, Sorbitol, Polysorbate 20, Flavor, Sodium Bicarbonate, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Lysozyme, Proteases, Thymol, Chlorophyllin, Camellia Sinesis Leaf Extract, Sodium Chloride, Zinc Gluconate, Cetylpyridinium Chloride.Safety Warning: Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store at room temperature. Not intended for human use.This dog dental spray is a great alternative to using a dog toothbrush and dog toothpaste for dog teeth cleanings. This is a great dog breath freshener to get fresh breath for dogs without brushing dogs teeth. Use this for dog teeth cleaning for tooth cleaner plaque removal and tartar control. The arm and hammer dental spray for dogs helps freshen breath so it is a great dental spray dog. name: Oral Spray for Dogs and Cats Teeth Cleaning Spray Freshens Breath, Soothes Gums, Alcohol Free Daily Dental Care with Pure Hypochlorous – 3.38 oz
short_description: ELIMINATES BAD BREATH : Freshen your pet’s breath instantly with every application. Vetenix Oral & Dental Care Spray uses pure hypochlorous (HOCl) to neutralize odor at the source—no brushing, rinsing, artificial flavors, or added stress. Perfect for pets who dislike toothbrushes or flavored dental products. Use twice daily for long-lasting freshness and cleaner, healthier snuggles.

SOOTHES IRRITATED GUMS & MOUTH : Calms redness, irritation, and oral discomfort with every spray. Vetenix is formulated to support gum health and ease sensitivity without stinging or burning. The pH-balanced, alcohol-free formula provides gentle relief for gums, tongue, and mouth tissues. Ideal for daily maintenance, after meals, or anytime irritation arises.

EXTENDED NOZZLE FOR PRECISE APPLICATION : Designed for easy, accurate use, the extended nozzle delivers a fine, targeted mist across the gums, teeth, and tongue—without the mess of gels or pastes. One-handed control allows fast, stress-free application, even for small pets or sensitive mouths. A cleaner, easier experience for both pets and pet parents.

SAFE FOR DAILY USE : Vetenix Oral & Dental Care Spray is lick-safe, rinse-free, and gentle enough for puppies, kittens, seniors, and sensitive pets when used as directed. Made without alcohol, dyes, fragrances, or artificial flavors, it supports daily oral hygiene and fresher breath—no rinsing, no foaming, no stress.

FORMULATED WITH ONLY 3 CLEAN INGREDIENTS : Made with only water, salt, and electricity, Vetenix delivers pure hypochlorous with exceptional quality and consistency. Produced in a cGMP-certified facility, it contains no buffers, no stabilizers, and no artificial additives—just clean, effective oral care you can trust.

name: PetSilver Teeth & Gum Spray - Dog Dental & Teeth Cleaning Spray for Plaque & Tartar Build-Up Reduction - Natural Breath Freshener for Dogs and Cats - Patented Chelated Silver - Made in The USA - 4 oz
short_description: FRESHEN BREATH: Discover a simple solution for addressing bad breath in dogs and cats. This dog breath spray offers a convenient dental treatment to help improve your pet's oral health. Simply spray directly onto your pet's teeth and gums to freshen stinky breath and support overall dental care. It’s an easy alternative when brushing isn’t feasible, making it an ideal choice for busy routines or quick maintenance.

ALL-NATURAL FORMULA: Formulated with patented chelated silver, this dog dental spray is designed to support cat dental health and manage plaque and tartar buildup. The silver helps combat bacteria and supports gum health, promoting overall oral hygiene. Silver has been valued for centuries, and this modern chelated version is easy to use as a dog mouth spray, providing a gentle, natural approach to maintaining oral care.

EASY TO USE: Simplify your pet’s dental routine with this pet teeth cleaning spray. No brushing is required—just a few sprays into their mouth to help freshen their breath and clean their teeth. It’s a quick and effective way to incorporate dental care into your pet’s daily routine.

ADVANCED CHELATED SILVER TECHNOLOGY: The chelated silver in this formula is designed for optimal particle size and even distribution throughout the mouth. It offers an alternative to colloidal silver and helps address bad breath in dogs while supporting cat dental health. This dog tooth plaque remover aids in reducing plaque and tartar buildup on your pet’s teeth and gums.

MADE IN THE USA: This dog teeth spray and bad breath solution for dogs and cats is FDA-registered and proudly made in the USA, following strict GMP guidelines. Crafted with care, it’s an ideal choice for those looking to enhance their pet’s oral care routine with a trusted, high-quality product.

name: Arm & Hammer Complete Care Dog Dental Spray, Mint Flavor, Easy Brushless Dog Breath Freshener, Baking Soda Enhanced Formula for Fresh Dog Breath, 6oz
short_description: DOG BREATH FRESHENER, NO BRUSHING REQUIRED - Using no-brush dog dental spray is the easiest way to maintain fresh breath for dogs, simply give a spritz when needed.
BAKING SODA ENHANCED FORMULA - This dental spray for dogs is made with signature Arm & Hammer baking soda to clean teeth and deodorize bad dog breath.
MINT FLAVORED DOG BREATH SPRAY FOR BAD DOG BREATH - Dogs love the fresh mint flavor of this dental spray for dogs
NEW AND IMPROVED FORMULA WITH ADDED CALCIUM – The same great dental formulas you love, but with added calcium - an essential building block for strong tooth enamel.
PET FRIENDLY DOG DENTAL SPRAY FORMULA - This fluoride-free dog dental spray for dental care is odorless, flavorless, cruelty free and non-toxic when used as directed.
product_description: Arm & Hammer Complete Care Dental Spray for Dogs is a premium solution for maintaining your pet's oral hygiene with ease and efficiency. As a leader in dog dental care, this product is formulated to cater specifically to the oral health needs of your canine companion. Our dog dental spray is designed to be a simple yet effective way to ensure fresh breath for dogs, while promoting overall dental health without the hassle of brushing. This mint dog breath freshener is an innovation in dental care, allowing you to effortlessly integrate oral care into your dog's daily routine. Each 6oz bottle contains a pet-friendly formula enhanced with the power of Arm & Hammer baking soda to naturally clean and deodorize your dog's mouth. In addition to baking soda, our formula is fortified with added calcium, a crucial element in the make up of healthy teeth. Our Arm & Hammer Complete Care Dental Spray is a testament to our commitment to pet care, offering a no-brushing solution that seamlessly fits into your lifestyle. This dog spray not only aids in maintaining fresh breath for dogs but also contributes to overall oral health, making it an essential addition to your dog's daily regimen. Choose Arm & Hammer Complete Care Dental Spray for a simple, effective, and trusted solution to your dog's oral hygiene needs. DIRECTIONS: Lift lips on either side of your dog's mouth. Spray 1-2 pumps directly onto teeth and gums per side. For best results, do not let dog eat or drink for one hour after use.
